articles.title: Sanna Marin defeated by Finland's conservatives in tight race - BBC
articles.description: After a dramatic three-way race, Petteri Orpo claims victory in Finland's election.
articles.content:
Finnish conservative leader Petteri Orpo has won a nail-biting three-way election race, defeating Prime Minister Sanna Marin's centre left.
